name: Final Destination (Pirhana)
description:
Embark on a quest through a make-believe land to save the world.

Final Destination is a turned based RPG with a quirky sense of humor inspired by the 16 bit classics. It was made in a week for the Brackeys 2022.1 Game Jam. The theme for the jam was "It is not real" - we'll leave it up to you to discover how the game incorporates the idea. Enjoy, and let us know what you think!

Leave us a comment so we can play your game as well! Plus, we love feedback!

Notes

The web version lags a little when changing screens, and takes between 5 to 10 seconds to load at first when launching the game. It is recommended to use the downloadable version (Windows only) for a better experience. Enjoy!

Controls

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move
Space - Interact
ESC / Tab - Back

Credits

Game design, Programming, Art - Pirhana
Music, Sound Design - Major Bruno
